page.title: 13WEST COKER AREA HOUSING
page.content: ALTHOUGH MOST OF THE HOUSING WAS BUILT BEFORE 1800 THERE IS SOME VICTORIAN,EDWARDIAN AND MODERN DEVELOPMENT. HOUSES 1750_1910. THESE ARE BUILT ALSO OF HAMSTONE BUT WITH A LARGER MORE EVEN CUT STONE.THERE ARE SOME VICTORIAN BRICK AND SLATE BUILT HOUSES WHICH DO NOT BLEND WELL WITH THE LOCAL CHARACTER OF THE VILLAGES. MODERN HOUSING IS ON SMALL ESTATES OR INDIVIDUAL SITES.A NEW DEVELOPMENT OF 27 HOUSES ARE BEING BUILT AT WEST COKER AT THE MOMENT.THESE ARE OF RECONSTITUTED HAM STONE, AS ARE ALL MODERN HOUSES,THEY HAVE MULLION WINDOWS AND LINTELS TO GIVE THEM A TRADITIONAL APPEARANCE.THE BUILDERS 'ALFORD BROTHERS'HAVE RECENTLY BEEN AWARDED 'HOUSE BUILDERS OF THE YEAR' FOR THEIR GOOD DESIGN,WORKMANSHIP & ENERGY CONSERVATION.PRICES Â£67_85,000.
